Articles.Content:
Blaze had a team behind him to help him earn his legend. Mobius 1 was feared by his enemies and pretty much worked by himself. Plus in operation Katana, Skyeye noted that his combat record as a single pilot was equal to that of 5 squadron

if we were to look at it in true terms of squadron it would be like this

A squadron is made of 4-5 flights. A single flight was made up of 4-8 pilots

so if we are going on that logic. A single squadron actual has anywhere between 16-40 pilots

so if Mobius 1 is equal to 5 ISAF squadrons he is equal to 80-200 pilots

just as a side note if we took this logic and assumed everyone in Mobius flight that took place in operation Judgement Day (aka attack on Megalith) had the same skill as Mobius 1 (just assuming), Mobuis flight had the skill equivalent to 640-1600 ISAF pilots.

Also we could go into the technological advances the f-22 has over the f-14 but that would take an entire wiki page

So who is the real Ace of Aces

In 1v1 Mobius 1 should crush Blaze

In 1v4 Blaze might stand a chance

Oh, really? Blaze's team, that is, the rest of Wardog, isn't really a very big help in the game, so technically, if we look at, oh, say, the mission "Journey Home" in Ace Combat 5, Mobius 1 would've ended up just like Chopper did. Blaze is one of the famous "Demons of Razgriz." Not even Mobius 1 could kill that Demon. I'd say that fight depends on the location and the planes. Mobius 1 is just an ace. At the end of Ace Combat 5, Swordsman says that Blaze is "The Ace of Aces." He can't be beaten. Period. Not even the Belkan Aces, aka Ofnir and Grabacr, could kill Blaze. He decimated them. He pretty much single-handedly destroy 4 different superweapons, in 4 different missions, in 4 different places. The Scinfaxi, the Hrimfaxi, the Arkbird and the SOLG. Beat that.

Edited October 2, 2013 by FallingIntoBlack

perfect! my download is on page 70.

Because PGS Redemption was still considered alive I could still attack. However due to it crashing in on itself it was rendered useless....or was it

I remember someone saying earlier about how we should make rules for using people to board ships or something but I came up with a way to end this battle once and for all

The rules also state no ramming but nothing about pushing

I will just let the pics tell the story

(sorry there are no pics up until this point because I didn't think I could actually do it)

Captain Bob died during his last attack against probtek. For his bravery, he was posthumously given the rank of Admiral and the PGS Redemption was re-purposed to be the Battle of Pol Memorial

IDK who won or lost this battle. History determines the winner

Spartwo thanks for participating in my first battle. You were a worth advisory and look forward to doing it again

I started this battle with a bible verse and thats how I ll end it

Philippians 4:13

I can do all things through Jesus Christ, who strengthens me.

Edited October 3, 2013 by War Eagle 1
hahaha oh my god that is the best end to a battle ever. you both lost, but WOW that is an unexpected move.
Regarding the planned eve excursion I don't think you should be able to fire on the same team as the previous person.

Regarding the planned eve excursion I don't think you should be able to fire on the same team as the previous person.

sounds like a good plan. like Player A attacks Player B, Player B attacks Player C, Player C attacks Player A.

sounds like a good plan. like Player A attacks Player B, Player B attacks Player C, Player C attacks Player A.

But player A can attack player C if player B attacked player A

Man im almost glad im not joining in this one. Id get confused as to who goes and who attacks who.

maybe yall should state who the download is going to go to so yall dont get confused.

ok sure. but we must make it clear, or we will have problems....
So when should this battle begin?
*slow golf clap*

*slow golf clap*

what is the golf clap for?

Alright, rule four pretty much destroyed my entire "Invincible-missile-splitty-shippy-thingy" since the entire thing is technically a smart missile with smart missiles on the smart missile and then more smart missiles on the smart missiles on the smart missile.

I'm trying to design a fleet for this battle.

To avoid confusion, I figure we should just have a free for all, and if two of us decide to stop shooting each other temporarily, so be it.
Just to make this clear, I have no expectations to win or even survive this battle, I simply want to test design principles and ships.

Mother of God! I decided to do a weapons test on the Unrelenting Warrior, it's in pieces! There's debris everywhere.

So much for plating.

what is the golf clap for?

For de-orbiting the ship with a Kerbal.

Mother of God! I decided to do a weapons test on the Unrelenting Warrior, it's in pieces! There's debris everywhere.
